data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=OR4YAxz0KKYQ7kNvgErA0e2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A3Hi5m0lDA0DJJwuuqurLzH&oh=00_AYCgSo6nmhui35wgFnNaBrNPj0hdeDH2ehKz1VNqWFpbnA&oe=66E2E48C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_2KMeJ3nxoIQ7kNvgGN0zby&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=A3Hi5m0lDA0DJJwuuqurLzH&oh=00_AYBGcyEM-LLXR-B9w6kkEDgFtLExmx4K2rNnBhQgYoHC8w&oe=66E2E29F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
